mapper.sql: id, title, subhead, content, author, editor, dutyEditor, url, keyword, tag, summary, channelId, subjectId, category, isDel, status, ctime, utime
mapper.update: update t_entry set title=#{title}, subhead=#{subhead}, content=#{content}, author=#{author}, editor=#{editor}, dutyEditor=#{dutyEditor}, url=#{url}, tag=#{tag}, summary=#{summary}, channelId=#{channelId}, subjectId=#{subjectId}, utime=#{uptime} where id=#{id}
update t_entry set isDel =1 where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from t_entry where (#{0}='' or title like "%"#{0}"%") and isDel=0;

select
from t_entry a where (#{0}='' or title like "%"#{0}"%") and isDel=0 order by ctime desc limit #{1},#{2};
